entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:15 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 06:15 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
